attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this e-petition to knight Liverpool manager Kenny Dalglish for his contribution to football.
He helped the many lives of families who lost the people who are closest to them in the Hillsborough disaster and still bulit up a team to satisfy and make many football fans happy so soon after the tragic event. MPs are already discussing this and if you sign this, the option might be more looked into by them.
Please sign this e-petition to show your support for Kenny Dalglish whether you're a football fan or not

rejection.details: This petition has been added in error.  It is not possible to petition to bestow an honour.  All suggestions for honours should be made via the formal application process.
